verses.text: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* sister \w Phoebe|strong="G5402"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1249"\w* \f + \fr 16:1 \ft Or deaconess\f* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cenchrea|strong="G2747"\w*.

Greet \w Prisca|strong="G4251"\w* \f + \fr 16:3 \ft Prisca is a variant of Priscilla; see Acts 18:2.\f* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Aquila, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4904"\w* \w workers|strong="G4904"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

Avoid Divisions (Titus 3:9–11)

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w urge|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, brothers, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w watch|strong="G4648"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* create \w divisions|strong="G1370"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w obstacles|strong="G4625"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w contrary|strong="G3844"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*. \w Turn|strong="G1578"\w* \w away|strong="G1578"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

Greetings from Paul’s Fellow Workers (Colossians 4:7–14)

\w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4904"\w* \w worker|strong="G4904"\w*, sends \w you|strong="G5210"\w* greetings, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w*, \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sosipater|strong="G4989"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4904"\w* countrymen.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w Tertius|strong="G5060"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w down|strong="G1125"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w letter|strong="G1992"\w*, greet \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

Amen.\f* Doxology (Jude 1:24–25)

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w strengthen|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w proclamation|strong="G2782"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* revelation \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* concealed \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w ages|strong="G5550"\w* past
